data.expected_result: The line to the right of Recently Played and Now Playing doesn't disappear
data.short_description: The lines by Recently Played and Now Playing sometimes disappear on 90% zoom and below
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you are on 90% zoom or less - Go to the Activity Tab (or click on someone's mini profile who is playing a Verified game) - Click on any game's description (or the game shown in the mini profile) - Observe the area to the right of 'Recently Played' and 'Now Playing' - You might have to manually change your zoom level while on this pop up
